text: addēhattinṟe janatayile ahaṅkārikaḷāya pramāṇimār avarile durbalarēāṭ athavā avarile viśvasiccavarēāṭ cēādiccu: "svālih tanṟe nāthan niyēāgicca dūtan tanneyāṇenn niṅṅaḷkkuṟappuṇṭēā?” avar aṟiyiccu: "addēhaṁ ñaṅṅaḷilēkku vannat ēteāru sandēśavumāyāṇēā atil viśvasiccavarāṇ ñaṅṅaḷ; sanśayamilla.”
